chav1961.purelib.streams.chartarget

Class WriterCharTarget

  • java.lang.Object
    • chav1961.purelib.streams.chartarget.WriterCharTarget
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CharacterTarget

    public class WriterCharTarget
extends Object
implements CharacterTarget

    This class implements CharacterTarget interface by character streams.

    Since:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
